bibl.title: The Oracle of Amun in Siwa and the Visit of Alexander the Great.
bibl.note: ABOU EL ATTA Al Hussein, The Oracle of Amun in Siwa and the Visit of Alexander the Great.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 187-196.
